verbs.description: pa [ARG0: turnpike toll hike] [V: forcing] [ARG1: tractor - trailers] [ARG2: into local towns] the pennsylvania turnpike toll rates are about to go up again in 2019 and with each rate increase drivers and commercial truckers are being priced off the toll road and into our local towns channel pittsburgh general eugene depasquale channel 11 pa turnpike pennsylvania trisha pittman traffic anchor facebook auditor eugene depasquale pennsylvania turnpike
